alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:49PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN BLOUNT AND SOUTHWESTERN SEVIER COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles southeast of Maryville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Maryville, Alcoa, Pigeon Forge, Eagleton Village, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Townsend, Walland, Happy Valley, Wildwood, and Wears Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains
